text:
Hi !
When Quickbooks is integrated with HubSpot. Can we use HubSpot API calls to look for invoices and associate them to deals ?
Hello ! I create my developper api key via my developer account (like in the photo) but when I use it, I have the error : This hapikey doesn't exist, can you help ?

Hi <@U02E6LPLW72> ,
Can you please share the API URL?
<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/timeline/388956/event-templates?hapikey=>
(To get eventTemplate from my app)
Is the value of HubSpot APP ID is correct? `388956` ?
Yes

Can you please validate your hapikey once with this URL?
<https://api.hubapi.com/properties/v1/contacts/properties?hapikey=><your_hapi_key>

`{"status":"error","message":"This app hasn't been granted all required scopes to make this call. Read more about required scopes here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/scopes>.","correlationId":"3fb0785a-****-****-****-135914eb7c1d","errors":[{"message":"One or more of the following scopes are required.","context":{"requiredScopes":["contacts","tickets","e-commerce","media_bridge.read","crm.schemas.custom.read","timeline"]}}],"links":{"scopes":"<https://developers.HubSpot.com/scopes>"},"category":"MISSING_SCOPES"}`
I have this error, I don't understand the link with the scope for this request

Verify your App's scope once. Here is a guide (section 3 named *Scopes* )
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/creating-an-app>
`timeline` scope
This scope is already on my app
I see..

We have checked for all the possibilities except App installation in your HubSpot account. Although their is no such thing is mentioned in the document but let me take a look as I think App installation in your HubSpot account would be required to access the APIs
Also, have you tried to re-create HAPI KEY...you can try
I tried to recreate my hapikey and I install my app on my test account (created with my develper account)
(And that's why this problem make me crazy, I tried a lot of tips)
I have checked at my end...and I am able to hit a request to my account with the same method (HAPI+APP ID) . I have checked the API Request in App -> Settings -> Integrations -> HAPI KEY | Call Logs
Have you tried to execute API with HubSpot OAuth Token?

<@U02E6LPLW72> API key is irrelevant to your app.
You don't create it from the dev account, you create it straight out of your company's account, under settings, integrations, API Key

Hi Amrou,
Okay...yes, this sounds correct.  It got skipped from my mind :slightly_smiling_face:

<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/integrations/how-do-i-get-my-HubSpot-api-key>
I am sorry, I don't undertstand, you mean I have to use the token to my company account ? Not my developer account ?

No... he means the H_API_KEY that you have created from your Developer account....it actually needs to get created from your normal HubSpot user account.
Here is the URL: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/integrations/how-do-i-get-my-HubSpot-api-key>

Ha ok, sorry, but I already create this api key, but to get the event template I had this error :
```this hapikey does not have proper permissions! (requires all of [developers-read])```
Those tokens (from developper account and from compagny account as in your link) arent differents ?
(This token work for the request you told me to try at the beginning to get all propeties)
Okay, let me take a look again.
Thanks a lot

Meanwhile, Can you please confirm every step mentioned in the below documents?
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/faq/developer-api-keys>
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/faq/installing-an-app>
The Install App should be visible in HubSpot User Account -> Settings -> Integrations -> Connected Apps after install
I confirm, I did everything and I can see my app in the setting of my test account
heyo, pretty sure this is for the UI

this is rolled out to prod now, so you can hit the `/account-info/v3/details` endpoint with a hapikey or oauth token, and there will be `uiDomain` field in the response which tells you the domain where the product UI is hosted for that portal, for example:
```➜  ~ http --body <https://api.hubapi.com/account-info/v3/details> hapikey==REDACTED
{
    "additionalCurrencies": [],
    "companyCurrency": "USD",
    "portalId": 24485727,
    "timeZone": "US/Eastern",
    "uiDomain": "<http://app-eu1.HubSpot.com|app-eu1.HubSpot.com>",
    "utcOffset": "-04:00",
    "utcOffsetMilliseconds": -14400000
}```
will close the community post as well now :wink:
thank you :slightly_smiling_face:
<@UD53A9UUR> sorry, just one more thing, is this only for `v3`? we still use an older version. Thanks
this would be for v3
hello! does anyone have any insight into third party tools for integration with hs that support custom objects? (i'm talking about the likes of integromat and skyvia)

Hi everyone! Sorry if this is a basic question. I’m trying to use the update API endpoint to update a contact, but I keep getting an error “No properties found to update, please provide at least one.” even when I copy the example from the API documentation. Happy to send the code I’m using if that would help! Thank you all!
If you could provide a sample of your code, that would help
along with which version of the API you are using. I might be able to tell you right away what the problem might be.
yep. <@U01C87PNTDE> is correct!  add your call and the body and we can help out (no api key please!)
